task_summary: Navigate a robotic arm to reach the scissors while avoiding obstacles as visualized in the workspace.

task_long_description.overview: This task requires a robotic arm to visually locate the scissors among clutter on a table and maneuver around obstacles to reach them. The arm begins from a home or approach pose, uses perception to detect the scissors, refines its position above them, and carefully plans a trajectory to avoid colliding with other objects, executing a stepwise approach and alignment. Success depends on reaching the scissors without disturbing other items.
preconditions: Scissors are present and visible in workspace.
Obstacle objects (e.g., cup, books) exist between robot and scissors.
Robot is at initial safe position.
stepwise_plan: 1. Confirm scissors are visible. If not, scan the scene.
4. Align and approach, compensating for clutter.
5. Move laterally in y and x to avoid obstacles.
success_criteria: Robot reaches scissors without colliding with obstacles.
Final end-effector pose is above or at scissors.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect scissors: retry up to 3 times scanning.
Path blocked: incremental lateral moves to replan.
Perception error: reacquire target and realign.
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when IsAt(scissors) returns success.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Check if scissors are visible in the robot's workspace
Scan the workspace in a raster pattern to locate scissors if not visible
Run object detection to localize scissors
Move the end-effector to a position above the scissors with 5cm clearance
Proceed and align towards the scissors with a 5mm precision
Offset end-effector in y-axis (10cm) to sidestep obstacles
Offset end-effector in x-axis (10cm) to bypass obstacles
Directly move to the scissors target location
Verify if the end-effector is at the scissors

failure_modes: Scissors not found due to occlusion
recovery_strategy: Rescan scene if scissors not found
Incrementally adjust (MoveDelta) position to avoid obstacles
assumptions: Instruction requests obstacle avoidance but does not specify object layouts; obstacle avoidance steps are inferred from frame evidence.
Scissors are present and reachable in all frames.
Timeouts and tolerances are selected based on available port bins and implied careful motion.
No grasp/execution, only reaching, as grasp is not performed in frames (no gripping detected).

expected_success_criteria: Arm end-effector arrives at scissors without colliding with obstacles
